attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the labour politicians voicedconcern last november at the rise of top councilors wages in e yorks. support for the local petitions has been tremendous phone and written complaints have been largely ignawd .to give yourself and your buddies from £9-12000payincrease by saying[we have to have big salaries to attract the bast people] is just laughing at the public. allthis when the eryc had cut social care ,fire service,free swimming for kids ect. our roads are in a terrible state for want of repair the council tax just keeps on rising to cover what more large pay rises for the few . when this sort of thing isnt stopped.it reminds me of why i changed from being a quiet everyday person to someone who now complains -----but who listens to the small guy anymore.
